text: Hey is anyone here part of OHDSI (Observational Health Data Sciences and Informatics)? I see that there are no software packages built in Julia for the interface - I am trying to figure out if that is by choice or if there is simply a paucity of Julia programmers in this space. Thanks! :juliaheartpulse-dark:
